HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - Update to be compatibile with Rimworld 1.4. Adding new 1.4 buildings will come later, once all my mods are compatibile.
- This update fixes errors caused by VE removing various items from their modules without notice. A future update will have to come to update for any new items added
- This update moves all Replace Stuff Compatibility into XML Patches, allowing mod authors or community members to make their own items Replace Stuff compatible
